Sports Towel (Irem, M)
kDesc
A sports towel featuring Chinese characters that spell out "Irem," worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
Une serviette de sport ornée de caractères chinois signifiant "Irem", à porter autour du cou pendant une promenade sans t-shirt.[#Legal]
Ein Sporthandtuch mit den chinesischen Schriftzeichen für "Irem", das man sich um den Hals legen kann, wenn man kein Hemd trägt.[#Legal]
Un asciugamano sportivo con degli ideogrammi cinesi che formano la parola "Irem" indossato al collo e a torso nudo.[#Legal]
Una toalla de deporte con el nombre "Irem" en caracteres chinos que se coloca alrededor del cuello al pasear con el torso desnudo.[#Legal]
裸になった上半身の首にかけた、「愛礼夢（あいれむ）」と書かれたスポーツタオル。[#Legal]
벗은 상반신에 목에 거는, 「愛礼夢(아이렘)」이라고 쓰여진 스포츠 타올.[#Legal]
A sports towel featuring Chinese characters that spell out "Irem," worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
掛在赤裸上半身脖子上、寫有「愛禮夢」的運動毛巾。[#Legal]
掛在赤裸上半身脖子上、寫有「愛禮夢」的運動毛巾。[#Legal]
A sports towel featuring Chinese characters that spell out "Irem," worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
